ABOUT US

We are a consulting company with 13 years of experience in the Brazilian, American and European markets.

Our objective is to cross borders and bring the best professionals closer to the best opportunities, wherever they are, and always in search of the best cost-benefit in IT solutions.

What we do

OFFSHORE BRASIL

We have a solid and diversified network which allows us to offer specialized and experienced resources at competitive prices, to attend full remote projects without sacrificing quality.
